name: Part 1: Goblin Arrows
overview: Party escorts supply wagon from Neverwinter to Phandalin. Ambushed by Cragmaw goblins on the Triboar Trail. Must track goblins to their hideout and rescue Sildar Hallwinter.
major_treasure: Boots of Striding and Springing (on Tharden's corpse)
600 cp, 110 sp, 2 potions of healing, jade frog statuette (40 gp)
plot_developments: Gundren and Sildar ambushed - Gundren taken to Cragmaw Castle
Sildar reveals Wave Echo Cave exists
Map to Wave Echo Cave stolen
